dialogueLines.line: Looks like I have walk through here to get to that shooting competition.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Huh? Is that who I think it is?
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: What are you doing here, Pico?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: I was just on my way to somewhere else, but since you're here...
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Fork over the money you owe me, Boyfriend. You're overdue.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Erm, I'll pay you back next week.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: No, you'll pay me back right now.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Uh...I left it in the oven.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: You could at least come up with a more convincing excuse.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Err, maybe there's a different way we could settle this?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf

dialogueLines.line: Maybe a little back and forth with a microphone?
dialogueLines.speaker: gf
